tp:enum.name: Activity_Level

tp:enumvalue.tp:docstring: The device is inactive, for example the screen is locked.

tp:enum.tp:docstring: The activity level of the device.

tp:rationale.p: The connection could determine through the activity level if it should take measures to conserve power, for example by reducing network chatter.

arg.name: Activity_State
arg.tp:docstring: The activity level to set to.

tp:docstring.p: The current activity level the connection is set to. Change notifications is via the ActivityStateChanged signal.

arg.name: Activity_State
arg.tp:docstring: The new activity state of the connections.

tp:docstring.p: An interface for telling the connection when to enter and leave power saving mode.
